name: slackmojis
title: Slackmojis
description: An unofficial directory of the best custom Slack emojis from slackmojis.com
author: timoransky

commands.name: slackmojis-search
commands.title: Slackmojis Search
commands.description: Search for custom Slack emojis from the unofficial Slackmojis directory slackmojis.com

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
